name: Vegetable Pakora
author: SK
summary: A very yummy Indian snack or side dish. Also great to eat those veggies. You can really try different veggies you like! Serve hot with tamarind/chili chutney/dip or even with some tomato ketchup. Yum!
ingredients: ½ cup red onion, sliced lengthwise
directions: Heat oil in a wide skillet over medium heat
Combine gram flour, cumin, cayenne pepper, turmeric, and salt in a bowl
Add 2 tablespoons of the hot oil and mix well
Add water, a little at a time, until a very thick batter forms
Dip potatoes and cauliflower in batter and add to the hot oil in batches without crowding
Turn and fry until golden brown, 3 to 5 minutes
Add onions to remaining batter all at once; scoop onion-batter into the oil and fry until golden, 3 to 5 minutes
